_comment: R3MES Genesis Template - Replace placeholders with actual values
_instructions: This template should be populated by scripts/finalize_genesis.py before use

params._comment: Module parameters (empty by default, can be configured later via governance)

remes._comment_model_hash: DEPRECATED: IPFS hash of initial BitNet model. Use model_registry_list instead.
remes._comment_model_version: DEPRECATED: Initial model version. Use model_registry_list instead.
remes._comment_initial_participants: List of initial miner addresses (Cosmos addresses starting with 'remes1...')
remes._comment_stored_gradient_list: List of stored gradients at genesis (usually empty)
remes._comment_model_registry_list: List of approved model configurations. If empty, model_hash/model_version will be used (backward compatibility). Each entry should have: model_id, config (model_type, model_version, architecture_config, etc.), approved_at_height, approved_by, is_active, created_at

genesis_vault_list._comment: Placeholder for genesis vault entry (trap job). Replace with actual entries generated by scripts/generate_genesis_traps.py

remes._comment_genesis_vault_list: List of initial trap job entries for the genesis vault. These are pre-computed trap jobs used for lazy mining detection (Tolerant Verification system). Generate 50-100 entries using scripts/generate_genesis_traps.py

_other_modules._comment: Other Cosmos SDK modules (auth, bank, staking, etc.) will be added here by remesd init or genesis generation commands
